member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2Authenticator
member.summary: Base class for OAuth 2 Authenticators.
member.remarks:
Since there are many ways to authenticate in OAuth2, this is used as a base class to differentiate between other authenticators.
Any other OAuth2 authenticators must derive from this abstract class.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2Authenticator.#ctor(RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Will be called when the authentication failed
member.returns: Task where the handler for a failed authentication gets executed

member.summary: Will be called when the authentication failed

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client
member.summary: Base class for OAuth2 client implementation.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.IClient
member.summary: Defines API for doing user authentication using certain third-party service.
member.remarks: Standard flow is: - client is used to generate login link () - hosting app renders page with generated login link - user clicks login link - this leads to redirect to third-party service site - user authenticates and allows app access their basic information - third-party service redirects user to hosting app - hosting app reads user information using method

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.IClient.GetLoginLinkUri(System.String)
member.summary: Returns URI of service which should be called in order to start authentication process. You should use this URI when rendering login link.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.IClient.GetUserInfo(System.Linq.ILookup{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Obtains user information using third-party authentication service using data provided via callback request.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.IClient.Name
member.summary: Friendly name of provider (third-party authentication service). Defined by client implementation developer and supposed to be unique.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.IClient.State
member.summary: State which was posted as additional parameter to service and then received along with main answer.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.IClient.Configuration
member.summary: Client configuration object.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.#ctor(RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.Infrastructure.IRequestFactory,RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.Configuration.IClientConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.GetLoginLinkUri(System.String)
member.summary: Returns URI of service which should be called in order to start authentication process. This URI should be used for rendering login link.
member.param: Any additional information that will be posted back by service.
member.returns: A string containing the login link URI

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.GetUserInfo(System.Linq.ILookup{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Obtains user information using RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2 service and data provided via callback request.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.GetToken(System.Linq.ILookup{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Issues query for access token and returns access token.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.GetCurrentToken(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Get the current access token - and optionally refreshes it if it is expired
member.param: The refresh token to use (null == default)
Enforce an update of the access token?
A custom safety margin to check if the access token is expired

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.ParseStringResponse(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parse the response, search for a key and return its value.
member.returns: The value for the queried key
member.exception: Thrown when the key wasn't found

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.ParseStringResponse(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Parse the response for a given key/value using either JSON or form url encoded parameters
member.returns: The values for the queried keys

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.ParseAccessTokenResponse(System.String)
member.summary: Parse the access token response using either JSON or form url encoded parameters
member.param: The content to parse the access token from

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.ParseUserInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Should return parsed using content received from provider.
member.param: The content which is received from provider.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.BeforeGetLoginLinkUri(RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.BeforeAfterRequestArgs)
member.summary: Called just before building the request URI when everything is ready. Allows to add extra parameters to request or do any other needed preparations.
member.returns: The task this handler is processed on

member.summary: Called just after obtaining response with access token from service. Allows to read extra data returned along with access token.

member.summary: Called just before issuing request to service when everything is ready. Allows to add extra parameters to request or do any other needed preparations.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.GetUserInfo
member.summary: Obtains user information using provider API.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Authenticators.OAuth2.OAuth2Client.QueryAccessToken(System.Linq.ILookup{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Issues query for access token and parses response.

member.summary: Gets the client configuration object.

member.summary: Gets the friendly name of provider (OAuth2 service).

member.summary: Gets the state (any additional information that was provided by application and is posted back by service).

member.summary: Gets the token type returned by provider. Can be used for further calls of provider API.

member.summary: Gets or sets the time when the access token expires

member.summary: Gets or sets a safety margin that's used to see if an access token is expired
